Dinobot: A... small problem. I usually download with the other optic,
but..=
. Let`s just say I admire your marksmanship. Here we go.

He started sendin=
g the information. That included the exact locations
of the Ark and the Nem=
esis as well as the presence of the Matrix of
leadership.

Dinobot: That is=
 the secret I share with you now. I entrust it to you.
Do not let any minio=
n learn of it. You know what the consequences
would be. Now... I did mentio=
n I had an idea. I do not think opening
the Matrix would be a good idea sin=
ce it would be time-limited if we
find someone who can open it. But, if we =
divert its energy to create
some kind of shield...

He stopped, letting Per=
seus ponder on the possibilities.
